lead_paragraph: The Philippines’ new president wants to move Ferdinand Marcos’s body to a cemetery for heroes. It’s an affront to our history.

headline.print_headline: A Hero’s Burial for a Dictator
headline.main: A Hero’s Burial for a Long-Dead Dictator

snippet: The Philippines’ new president wants to move Ferdinand Marcos’s body to a cemetery for heroes. It’s an affront to our history....
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Miguel Syjuco examines why so many Filipinos support Pres Rodrigo Duterte's proposal to give former dictator Ferdinand E Marcos hero's burial in Cemetery of Heroes in Manila, despite Marcos regime's long list of crimes; observes Duterte has spoken admiringly of strongmen, and has displayed similarly brutal and dictatorial tendencies.
